alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 2:27PM MDT until March 30 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO 9 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet MSL and 6 to 12 inches in the valleys below. * WHERE...Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena Summit, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 3 AM Wednesday to 9 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
